short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to aid in breathing exercises.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Just Breathe" Chrome extension is a completely free and simple tool designed to enhance your mental wellness through the practice of guided breathing exercises. It's built with a focus on ease of use, offering a variety of breathing techniques tailored to reduce stress, improve focus, and enhance overall well-being.

In today's world, managing stress effectively has become crucial. "Just Breathe" provides a seamless way to engage in breathing exercises that can significantly lower anxiety levels in moments of need. Whether facing a stressful situation or seeking a method to decompress after a busy day, this extension offers a strategy to relax effectively.

This extension is free and accessible for all Chrome users, embodying a commitment to supporting mental health and well-being. It serves as an simple and useful tool for anyone looking to discover the positive impacts of mindful breathing on their health and daily life through the easy access of your Chrome Browser.

Instructions: Simply open the Chrome Extension. Hover your mouse around the edges of the interface to reveal varying panels that allow you to customize the breathing cycle. When ready, simply click the start.

This was designed for myself and I sincerely hope this is useful to others.
